name: Butterfly
description: Only the mightiest and most experienced of warriors can wield the Butterfly, but it provides incredible dexterity in combat.
additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant 35 attack speed and 5.83 main armor
35 main attack damage to agility heroes
15.75 main attack damage to universal heroes
Stacks diminishingly with other evasion sources
Increases most heroes survivability against physical attacks by 53.85%
If someone in your team already has evasion like Phantom Assassin or another Butterfly, decide if increasing evasion will be a good idea as the enemy team will generally rush a Monkey King Bar
The more evasion a team has, the more valuable Monkey King Bar gets for the enemy team
However, if the enemy team is greatly suppressed and underfarmed, increasing evasion could be a good decision
